square.title: Command Reroll
square.content: Cost: 1CP Faction: Core Detachment: null WHEN: In any phase, just after you have made a HIT ROLL, WOUND ROLL, DAMAGE ROLL, SAVING THROW, ADVANCE ROLL, CHARGE ROLL, DESPERATE ESCAPE TEST, HAZARDOUS TEST, or NUMBER OF ATTACKS ROLL TARGET: null RESTRICTION: none EFFECT: You re-roll that ROLL, TEST, or SAVE.

square.title: Counter-Offensive
square.content: Cost: 2CP Faction: Core Detachment: null WHEN: FIGHT PHASE, just after an ENEMY UNIT has fought TARGET: One UNIT from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units and that has not already been selected to fight this phase. RESTRICTION: none EFFECT: Your unit fights next.

square.title: Epic Challenge
square.content: Cost: 1CP Faction: Core Detachment: null WHEN: FIGHT PHASE, when a CHARACTER unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more attached units is selected to fight. TARGET: One CHARACTER model in your unit. RESTRICTION: none EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, all melee attacks made by that model have the PRECISION ability.

square.title: Insane Bravery
square.content: Cost: 1CP Faction: Core Detachment: null WHEN: BATTLE-SHOCK step of your COMMAND PHASE, just after you have failed a BATTLE-SHOCK TEST taken for a unit from your army. TARGET: The unit from your army that the BATTLE-SHOCK test was just taken for. RESTRICTION: none EFFECT: Your unit is treated as having passed that test instead, and is not BATTLE-SHOCKED as a result.

square.title: Grenade
square.content: Cost: 1CP Faction: Core Detachment: null WHEN: Your SHOOTING PHASE. TARGET: One GRENADES unit from your army that is not within engagement range of any enemy units and has not been selected to shoot this phase. RESTRICTION: none EFFECT: Select one enemy unit that is not within Engagement range of any units from your army and is within 8 inches of and visible to your GRENADES unit. Roll six D6: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 MW.
